item.title: [Scar][RS2][SLR] Bone Buryer
item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

[quote=“Baros Rocks, post:2, topic:138681”][quote author=Final_Destiny link=topic=190600.msg1716911#msg1716911 date=1188524838]
Here is the code for the bone buryer

[code]//Hosted by Runescape 101
//Download more free scar scripts from www.rs101.info
//-------------------->Auto BoneBuryer By Final_Destiny<----------------------//
// DO NOT COPY ANY THING OFF MY SCRIPT //
// THIS SCRIPT DOESNT HAVE ANTI-RANDOMS //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// This Script will make your Character move once in a while //
// Because of the zombie random…Enjoy! //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program SmBoneBuryer;
{.include Si.txt}
const bonecolor=13948121;
const boneinvin=9539996;

procedure findbones;
begin
findcolorspiral(x,y,bonecolor,3,3,515,336)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
if not Findcolorspiral(x,y,bonecolor,3,3,515,336)
then end;

procedure burybones;
begin
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,594,301)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,627,230)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,667,232)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,709,230)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
mouse(x,y,40,12,true)
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,583,226)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,625,267)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,528,331)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,667,267)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,709,269)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
mouse(x,y,40,12,true)
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,582,304)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,627,303)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,669,303)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(300))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,712,305)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
mouse(x,y,40,12,true)
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,584,341)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,622,341)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,669,340)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,710,340)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,583,379)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,626,375)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,668,375)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,710,377)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,585,414)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,623,412)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,668,413)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
mouse(x,y,40,12,true)
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,707,410)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,584,449)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,626,448)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,667,450)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
findcolorspiral(x,y,boneinvin,3,3,711,448)
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
wait(300+random(700))
mouse(x,y,40,12,true)
end;

begin
loadinclude(‘Msn Messenger’)
repeat
findbones;
if(invincount=28)
then burybones;
until(false)
end.[/code]

No Download link will be posted, and i dont think im gonna make a update but enjoy

Post with your ratings etc.
[/quote]

http://www.rs101.info/scripts/scarscript.php?id=121

Gtfo, this isn’t your script. It even says in ‘your’ script about rs101.info.[/quote]

Talk about the script loser not about if he copied it.

Read full topic
